hadiths.text: Al-Mughirah bin Shu’bah said:“I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: ‘The rider should travel behind the funeral (procession) but the one who is walking may walk wherever he wants.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي شُهُودِ الْجَنَائِزِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning attending funerals
